meanings: important, significant, crucial (for/to), critical, vital (for/to), weighty, (미래에 영향을 미치는) momentous

vlive.korean: 여러분들 굉장히 중요한 스포죠? Isn't it a great spoiler? 듣기 View video SECHSKIES : [Replay] SECHSKIES - COMEBACK LIVE '젝다방 포 유 (SECHDABANG FOR YOU)'
과정이 중요한 거지 안 그래? Your hard work is what's important. Right? 듣기 View video tvN D : 내신등급이 내 인생의 등급일까? [언어의 온도 : 우리의 열아홉] Ep.1
vlive.english: Your hard work is what's important. Right?

vlive.korean: [그 어느 때보다 더 중요한 순간] 뭐 할까? [The most important moment] What should I pick? 듣기 View video Dispatch : [Dicon] “쯔위’s Special Day” (디아이콘 : 트와이스)
vlive.english: [The most important moment] What should I pick?

vlive.korean: 요리에서 가장 중요한 게 뭔지 알아? - 뭔데? Do you know what's most important? - What is it? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 막내의 사생활 23 (생일 기념❤)🦊
vlive.english: Do you know what's most important? - What is it?

vlive.korean: 사실 오늘 중요한 거는 정규 9집! But today, what's important is ... the offical 9th album! 듣기 View video SMTOWN : [FULL] 슈퍼주니어의 2YA2YAO! LIVE @ SJ THE STAGE
vlive.english: But today, what's important is ... the offical 9th album!

examples.korean: These thoughts were uppermost in my mind. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이러한 생각이 내 마음에서 가장 중요한 부분을 차지하고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: These thoughts were uppermost in my mind. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Earthworms do the important job of aerating the soil. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 지렁이는 흙 속에 공기가 통하게 만드는 중요한 일을 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Earthworms do the important job of aerating the soil. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Their comments have not materially affected our plans. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들의 논평이 우리 계획에 중요한 영향을 미치지는 않았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Their comments have not materially affected our plans. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The family has the important function of socializing children. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 가족은 아동을 사회화시키는 중요한 기능을 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The family has the important function of socializing children. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Parades and marches were the very stuff of politics in the region. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 행렬을 지어 시위와 행진을 하는 것이 그 지역에서 정치의 가장 중요한 요소였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Parades and marches were the very stuff of politics in the region. Add to Wordbook
